title: Chuchu90000
author: Chuchu90000
created_time: August 20, 2023, 01:14:43 PMLast edit: August 21, 2023, 09:22:43 AM by Chuchu90000

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: The collateral has to be more than the amount of loan you are seeking, not the other way round, buddy.With the amount of collateral you are offering, you could get a loan worth $80 or $90 at most.Maybe you could read through these threads:[EDU] The Rule of "No Collateral, No Loan" - IGNORE AT YOUR OWN RISK!Lending Board Rules of Engagement - Attention Lenders and Borrowers

comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.body: Quote from: Chuchu90000 on August 20, 2023, 01:14:43 PMI need 90$ for me and end week return totality thank youLoan Amount: 90 usdtLoan Purpose: PersonalLoan Repay Amount: 110 usdtLoan Repay Date: On or before August 28Type of Collateral: 100 usdtTrc20 - USDT : TJFa4Qt4eDkdXQCKCVbmwYHENGvJwVXmgfAnd Mp for speak of refund What's the point of this?  If you are using USDT as collateral for a USDT loan, why don't you just "borrow" from yourself and avoid the 20 USDT penalty?

comments.author: TryNinja
comments.body: So you send me the 100 USDT collateral, I send 90 USDT back to you as a “loan”, and after 1 week I get 20 USDT for myself? I’ll take that!

comments.author: Chuchu90000
comments.body: Quote from: DireWolfM14 on August 20, 2023, 02:13:48 PMQuote from: Chuchu90000 on August 20, 2023, 01:14:43 PMI need 90$ for me and end week return totality thank youLoan Amount: 90 usdtLoan Purpose: PersonalLoan Repay Amount: 110 usdtLoan Repay Date: On or before August 28Type of Collateral: 100 usdtTrc20 - USDT : TJFa4Qt4eDkdXQCKCVbmwYHENGvJwVXmgfAnd Mp for speak of refund What's the point of this?  If you are using USDT as collateral for a USDT loan, why don't you just "borrow" from yourself and avoid the 20 USDT penalty? advised me to put my crypto in earn and the crypto is frozen

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: Quote from: Chuchu90000 on August 20, 2023, 02:22:13 PMadvised me to put my crypto in earn and the crypto is frozenAre you trying to say crypto or USDT you are offering as collateral is frozen in some crypto "earn" program or service? Is it staked or in some DeFi?If that's a yes, then your collateral is not valid and might not get a loan from anyone here.

comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.body: Quote from: Chuchu90000 on August 20, 2023, 02:22:13 PMadvised me to put my crypto in earn and the crypto is frozenOh, your crypto is frozen.  Then may I ask how you plan to use frozen crypto as collateral?

comments.author: LoyceV
comments.body: Quote from: Chuchu90000 on August 20, 2023, 02:38:30 PMQuote from: TryNinja on August 20, 2023, 02:31:28 PMQuote from: Chuchu90000 on August 20, 2023, 02:30:08 PMIn earn its frozen for 1 week What is “earn”? Post a link.Earn in binance Piece of advice: you shouldn't be messing with things you don't understand. That is assuming you're not trying to scam someone. None of what you're saying makes sense.

comments.author: Chuchu90000
comments.body: Earn is a staking crypto in binance you understand ? what will my interest be in scamming people? I'm new because I can apply for a loan and you ask me questions I answer

comments.author: Chuchu90000
comments.body: I can understand that many people try to scam but this is not my case. jerome above my explain what i can hear asking with my collateral i discuss with you all and come to you saying that i say anything and that i want to scam people

comments.author: TryNinja
comments.body: How do you plan on giving the collateral to the lender? What prevents you of not paying back and withdrawing the USDT staked on Binance as soon as it unlocks? (and when is that?)You can’t transfer locked crypto from Binance Earn to another user, thus, your collateral is invalid.

comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.body: Quote from: Chuchu90000 on August 20, 2023, 05:18:04 PMI can understand that many people try to scam but this is not my case. jerome above my explain what i can hear asking with my collateral i discuss with you all and come to you saying that i say anything and that i want to scam peopleWhat JeromeTash is politely trying to say is that you don't have any collateral, which answers my initial question about the point of this request.  The promise of "frozen crypto" isn't collateral, and all your doing is wasting people's time.
